overview: We’ve added a new enterprise: qualifier to GitHub code search, making it easier to search across all organizations in your enterprise.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: We’ve added a new enterprise: qualifier to GitHub code search, making it easier to search across all organizations in your enterprise.

Previously, searching across multiple organizations required manually combining many org: qualifiers with boolean operators —a cumbersome process for enterprises with hundreds or thousands of organizations.

detailed_explanation.title: How it works
bullets: Add the enterprise: qualifier to any code search query to search across all organizations in your enterprise. Check out our docs for an example .
The enterprise: qualifier works seamlessly with other existing search qualifiers and is subject to the same limitations as all other qualifiers in GitHub Code Search .
This feature is now generally available for all GitHub Enterprise Cloud customers.

impact: This feature is now generally available for all GitHub Enterprise Cloud customers.
